resources.string: Please set a passphrase to encrypt the database. The passphrase should be at least 6 characters long. Choose a random sequence of characters, not a dictionary word and do not write it down. If you lose it, you won\'t be able to recover your data.
The passphrase you entered is not valid.
An error occurred while setting the password.
The passphrases entered do not match.
Press the back button one more time to exit.

Using the system provided lock requires that credentials are stored on the device. This device is only able to provide software backed storage for credentials, which is less secure than hardware backed storage. Continue?

Having no lock requires that credentials are stored on the device. This device is only able to provide software backed storage for credentials, which is less secure than hardware backed storage. Continue?
There was an error processing your request.
Only available on Android 6 and newer.
To use this feature, you have to secure your device with a password, pin or pattern.
The system provided lock functionality is unavailable.
The cryptographic function used for storing the app password.
The hash function was successfully changed
The entry name cannot be empty.
The passwords entered do not match.
An error occurred while saving the entry.
Are you sure you want to delete this entry? (Recovery is not possible)
Do you really want to discard the changes made?
Delete this custom field? (Recovery is not possible.)
Time before clearing clipboard after copying an item.
Time before requring authentication when the app is in background.
